term: How is the situation with the British?
content:
the british start shooting french ships and sinking them
however, the us could move in and be french lifeline and help move the french goods to france if they are being shot down and sunk
the british realized this and went and started targeting neutral US ships in french harbors
they ultimately seized around 300 of our ships
they also began “impressing” our sailors - ie they seized our ships and seized sailors off of our ships and forced them to work in a british [job/place]
	THIS IS AN ACT OF WAR!!!!
	if it happened today, it would definitely result in war
